page.title: 19LIFE IN STAINTON VILLAGE
page.content: My home is in Stainton Village and my family and I are very happy living there.It is a nice open place with lots of green fields with cows,sheep, goats,ducks and hens in them.We have a recreation area with swings,slides and a rocking horse.We have no shops so I have to go to Barnard Castle or Stainton Grove to spend my Â£2 pocket money.I go to school in Barnard Castle so I travel on the school bus.In the village hall there is Bingo and Keep Fit classes, and sometimes a disco,but I don't go very often.There is not even a pub in Stainton so if my Mam wants to go out for a drink with her friends, she to go by car or use the service bus.I have to use my bike or I walk.
